idea-plugin.name: Grazi
idea-plugin.description:
Grazi is a proofreader and grammar checker covering over 15 languages, including English, German, Russian, Chinese, and others. It improves the quality of texts written using IntelliJ Platform IDEs by providing intelligent spelling and grammar checking.
The plugin supports natural language constructs wherever they are: Kotlin, Python, and Java (including literals and docs), comments, Markdown, XML, and plain text. Under the hood, it uses LanguageTool, to provide you with the unrivaled performance and accuracy of the leading proofreading and grammar checking engine.
Note, that all verification is performed locally, inside your IDE. The plugin does not send any of your data anywhere.
To enable spellchecking or support for other languages (by default English is enabled) Use the Grazi settings located at Settings -> Tools -> Grazi
